extendedInfo.description: Dolphin: Evernote Add-on allows you to quickly clip the content from any website and upload directly to your Evernote account. Stay productive by keeping the full webpage content you want to refer to later in the cloud.Dolphin: Evernote Add-on is an exclusive Add-on for Dolphin Browser. Just search Dolphin Browser in Android Market or download here: http://bit.ly/D-AndroidWhat is an Add-on?Beef up your Dolphin Browser by installing your favorite Add-ons. Similar to a desktop Plug-in, each  Add-on will provides additional functionality on mobile device. Forgot password? Password Manager can help. Want a new look for your Dolphin? Download Shiny Shake to change colors. Want to read a webpage in French? Get Dolphin Translate. Click here to learn more: http://bit.ly/AndroidAdd-onListOther popular Dolphin Add-ons: â¢ Dolphin Webzineâ¢ Box for Dolphinâ¢ Dolphin.fmâ¢ Dolphin QRCode Shareâ¢ Bookmark to SDâ¢ Dolphin YouTube Searchâ¢ Dolphin eBay Searchâ¢ Dolphin Alexa Rankâ¢ Web to PDFâ¢ Dolphin Brightnessâ¢ Dolphin Password Manager Liteâ¢ Password Manager Proâ¢ Lastpass for Dolphin Browser â¢ Xmarks for Dolphin â¢ Dolphin Readerâ¢ Softpedia.com RSSâ¢ Dolphin Screen Cutâ¢ Bookmarks Widgetâ¢ Dolphin Desktop ToggleWe love hearing from you. Contact us at support@dolphin.com and rate us today!Join Dolphin Facebook Fan page: http://www.facebook.com/DolphinFans Follow Dolphin on Twitter: https://twitter.com/#!/DolphinBrowserWebsite: http://dolphin.com/

reviews.title: FINE TUNE IT!
reviews.comment: The add on on NEXT Browser is the best, and on Boat Browser it\'s the next best. And on Dolphin it\'s not so good : rarely works. Kindly fine tune it or forget it!
reviews.author: M A Parry

reviews.title: Disappointment
reviews.comment: This used to be my favorite app. I used it all the time. Originally you could click the evernote  icon any time you were browsing the web and it would copy the web page you were on directly  into evernote. Now when I click on it I continually get error messages saying the page is too big or the app is unsupportted or something. It just stopped working for some reason. There is another app, evernote clipper, that works but it is a real nuisance to use because it is not embedded in a fully-functioning browser so you have to copy and paste your url into it to save it.
reviews.author: Mary Kennedy

reviews.title: Important but defective
reviews.comment: The add-on is a must for Evernote/Dolphin users, yet it only works sporadically now.  I usually get a \"failed\" or \"page too large\" error, though it used to work beautifully.  My interim solution is to add the failed page to Pocket (the add-on is flawless) and if I really want to add it to Evernote I\'ll clip it from my computer\'s browser in the future when I check it out in Pocket.  I really hope this ad-on sees some development to fix this serious usability issue.
reviews.author: Dan Field

reviews.title: Used to work now it doesnt
reviews.comment: I dont get it. I dont know which broke, the evernote, evernote share or dolphin. No longer works. Any fix for this?
reviews.author: Claudine Ybanez

reviews.title: Love this ad-on
reviews.comment: Love using evernote. Now I can use it even faster to put notes and etc.
reviews.author: Laurynas Repecka
